alert.note: Alert for Crisp; Dooly; Pulaski; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 5:15AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Dodge, Pulaski, western Wilcox, southeastern Dooly, south central Bleckley and Crisp Counties through 545 AM EDT... At 515 AM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Hawkinsville to near Tippettville to near Georgia Veterans Memorial St Pk, and moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Cordele, Eastman, Hawkinsville, Vienna, Rochelle, Arabi, Pineview, Pitts, Plainfield, Richwood, Mock Springs, Seville, Ocmulgee Banks, Finleyson, Pleasant View, Tippettville, Raines, Wenona, Pulaski State Prison and East Crisp. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
